title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-2.2 - Responsibility to local community
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-2.2 - Responsibility to local community

State Regulations

Members also have a responsibility to the local
community. They are the means by which the community meets, to a degree, the
challenge of adequate housing for all its citizens. They also serve to alert
the community to housing conditions which require attention and to advise the
community of the means available from both private and public sources to
correct these conditions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
